content.en: Evolutionary Optimization: Evolutionary algorithms are being studied to understand their underlying concepts and how they can be combined with other methods to solve optimization problems. Researchers are also exploring the effectiveness of different algorithms, such as the COMOGA method and the MultiGen system, for solving constrained optimization problems and handling multiple-objective optimization. Additionally, there is interest in improving the efficiency and convergence performance of evolutionary search through hybrid optimization techniques and genetically adaptive multimethod search.
content.da: Evolutionsoptimering: Evolutionære algoritmer studeres for at forstå deres underliggende koncepter og hvordan de kan kombineres med andre metoder til at løse optimeringsproblemer. Forskere undersøger også effektiviteten af forskellige algoritmer, såsom COMOGA-metoden og MultiGen-systemet, til at løse begrænsede optimeringsproblemer og håndtere fler-måls optimering. Derudover er der interesse i at forbedre effektiviteten og konvergenspræstationen af evolutionær søgning gennem hybride optimeringsteknikker og genetisk adaptive multimethod-søgning.
